channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia faces new deportation efforts after ICE detains him in Baltimore
item.description: Kilmar Abrego Garcia has been detained by immigration authorities in Baltimore. However, a blanket court order automatically pauses any effort to immediately deport Abrego Garcia and other immigrants challenging their detention.

item.title: Some FEMA staff call out Trump cuts in public letter of dissent
After Trump and Congress spending cuts, public media stations wait on money for emergency alerts
